title: Username
body: i want to change my username but the name if taken by someone who hasnt played a game of league in 2 years, is there a way for me to get that name or can i simply not have it because they have it?

replies.body:
Summoner Names are released based on a schedule, as outlined in the [Summoner Name Clean Up](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-).

You can use this website to provide a good idea of when a Summoner Name will become available: https://lolnames.gg/en/
i see thanks for the help
